condition.narrative: Financial Management MOES - No later than forty-five (45) days from the Effective Date of the Loan Agreement, the Borrower shall,through MOES, develop and launch, within the Borrower's existing automated accounting software, a module acceptable to the Bank togenerate interim unaudited financial reports and capture the Project's accounts. | Due Date :09-Mar-2018

Project Implementation Unit - No later than thirty (30) days after the Effectiveness Date of the Loan Agreement, the Borrower,through MOES, shall establish and operate and maintain throughout project implementation, the PIU, with a composition, resourcesand terms of reference, and functions, all acceptable to the Bank. | Due Date :15-Feb-2018

Technical Advisory Panel - No later than ninety (90) days from the Effective Date of the Loan Agreement, the Borrower, throughMOES, shall establish, and thereafter maintain throughout Project Implementation, a Technical Advisory Panel, with composition,resources and terms of reference all satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :11-May-2018

title.narrative: Number of school-age children with special educational needs benefiting from supplied equipment and received psychological and pedagogical support
Number of rural schools with subject specific equipment and resources
Number of educational organizations equipped with special goods to support children with special educational needs
Number of school-age children with special educational needs benefiting from supplied equipment and received psychological and pedagogical support - rural
Number of developed test items including multimedia elements to assess students’ learning achievements in line with the new curriculum
Number of pedagogical universities implementing new curricula
Number of Initial Teacher Education curricula
Key components of primary and secondary education aligned with the new curriculum

baseline.value: Existing textbooks review requirements are general. Existing test items are mainly focused on factual knowledge andsubject-oriented, and not aligned with the new curriculum approach.Analysis shows that the current model of ITE is quite outdatedin terms of content, theory-practice balance, and teaching methods

target.value: Textbooks review requirements - fully aligned, external assessment systems – fully aligned, ITE- fully aligned

title.narrative: The results of the project are included in the State Program for the Development of Education and Science for 2020-2025 and discussed at the Public Council under the Ministry of Education and Science
Percentage of republished textbooks that are appraised in accordance with the updated requirements and criteria
External assessment instruments are designed in line with the new formats
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning - Female
